queryStringForGeocodeProperty

public static java.lang.String queryStringForGeocodeProperty(java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                             double latitude,
                                                             double longitude,
                                                             int radius,
                                                             AppacitiveDistanceMetrics metrics)
Helper method to generate a query string for geocode search.

Parameters:
propertyName - name of the geocode property of the schema to search for.
latitude - the geocode latitude to search for.
longitude - the geocode longitude to search for.
radius - the radios around the location to look for.
metrics - the distance either in km or miles.
Returns:
Query String.
